original: ma h'a pra tyam g'i ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma ha pra tyam g ra sa dha nam

original: phyir bzlog ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: phyir bzlog ma chen mo sgrub thabs

original: 'phags ma phyir bzlog ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phag ma phyir bzlog ma chen mo la phyag tshal lo

original: phyir bzlog ma chen mo nag mo zhal gcig phyag drug mar 'dod do //
analyzed: phyir bzlog ma chen mo nag mo zhal gcig phyag drug mar dod do

original: ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / mchog sbyin pa ni g-yas kyi phyag go //
analyzed: ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mchog sbyin ba ni g-yas kyi phyag go

original: padma dmar po dang / rtse gsum dang / snying gar @54a * //
analyzed: padma dmar po dang rtse gsum dang snying gar

original: gnas pa'i zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa ni g-yon pa'i phyag go //
analyzed: gnas ba zhags ba dang cha ba sdigs mdzub dang ldan ba ni g-yon ba phyag go

original: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: mi skyod ba dbu rgyan ba

original: lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi na bza dang rgyan dang ldan ba rnal byor ma zhes byed ba la sogs ba

original: phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: phyir bzlog ba chen mo sgrub thabs rdzogs so

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang khams ba lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris sgyur
